applicable_scenarios: Commercial contract disputes with arbitration clause
steps: Invoke arbitration clause or agreement via notice
Appoint arbitrator(s) by parties or appointing authority
Hold preliminary meeting to set timelines
Exchange statements of claim and defence
Party may apply to set aside award within 3 months (extendable to 6 months) under Section 34

jurisdiction.international: Schedule 2 applies to foreign-seated arbitration, may be excluded

relief_available: Specific performance clauses enforceable via award

appeals.enforcement: Decree can be challenged under Section 47

important_notes: Award is binding and enforceable as court decree
Court interference limited, only under narrow grounds
Parties can agree to fast-track procedures
Interim measures can be sought before courts or arbitrator
